summary: A list of every single item code for Skyrim and its DLC. Including all shouts, enchanted items, clothes, weapons, spells, perks, armor, found items, artifacts, house materials etc.
descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-DESCRIPTION-

A list of every single item code for Skyrim and its DLC. Including all shouts, enchanted items, clothes, weapons, spells, perks, armor, found items, artifacts, house materials etc.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-WARNING-

Some cheats can cause bugs, crashes, or problems with the game code. Make sure to save your game before you experiment with cheats. Achievements are also disabled once cheats are activated. Certain mods will change the load order. The load order is the first two digits of each ID Code. By default, all Dawnguard or Hearthfire Codes depending which one you own have a load order of “02" if you do not own other DLC. If you have mods or other DLC installed, either remove them, or change your load order from “02" to “03" to “04" or higher depending on the mods and DLC you have currently installed and how they alter Skyrim’s item database.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-NOTE-

Ahead of each item code for Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonborn you’ll find an “xx” you’ll need to replace with “00", “01", “02", “03" or higher depending on how many mods or DLC expansions you have installed. For example if you only have the Dawnguard DLC installed, the number to replace “XX” should be “03". Example: Glass "xx005a69" would be Glass "03005a69".

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-UPDATE?-

Will update when whatever the next DLC is arrives on PC.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Rhys Ian Harris
